## StencilState.setReadMask() method

Sets the bit mask for reading from the stencil buffer and reference value

**Signature:**

```typescript
setReadMask(mask: number): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mask | number | The read mask |
